§6Cryotheum §ris an §eice elemental dust§r. Commonly used to make §9Gelid Cryotheum§r, which is it's fluid from.
It's also used in making §eSignalum-related items§r, §eaugments§r, §efreezing fluids§r, and §eitems directly in the Crafting Grid§r. For instance, a §6Water Bucket§r can be combined with it to make §6Ice§r.

To obtain Cryotheum, you'll need a §6Snowball§r, §6Redstone Dust§r, and 2 §6Blizz Powder§r, which can be obtained with §6Blizz Rod§rs which is from the Blizz mob. You can also make one of these in a §6Centrifugal Seperator§r.
